title: Chasing the Case
description: New to the game. But that won't stop her.How does a woman disappear in a town of a thousand people? That's a 28-year-old mystery Isabel Long wants to solve.Isabel has the time to investigate. She just lost her husband and her job as a managing editor of a newspaper. (Yes, it's been a bad year.) And she's got a Watson - her 92-year-old mother who lives with her.To help her case, Isabel takes a job at the local watering hole, so she can get up close and personal with those connected to the mystery.As a journalist, Isabel never lost a story she chased. Now, as an amateur P.I., she's not about to lose this case either.
author: Joan Livingston
